title: Account stuck in transfer EUW TO LAS
body:
Hello

My main account who is 5 years old and where i got diamond on is stuck in a transfer for the last 24 hours

the ign on euw is : Gendut  ( http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/EUW/Gendut/summary )
my log in name was : epicjr

Now i changed it because they asked me this at the moment of transfer and i several times had a bug 9000 so they told my account was on still the EUW and that no RP has been taken of my account.

 5 minutes later i try to log back in and they say my account is being transferred : so i was like cool i did work 
Now im using my new log in name on LAS which is : Cedii 
And it says my account is being transferred on both servers !!!!!! I cant acces it anymore

I still had access on that account so i send support tickets like 4 of em and got no response at all ...

Now i cant have acces on my account at all anymore not even to post on the forums since its stuck between 2 servers ...;

Is there anyway somebody could help investigating cause my account is quite a lot for me since I have been playing for the last 5 years ....


Thanks in advance {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I have had my second reply and it seems the issue is that we tried to transfer but our names were already taken in the destination and so our account's User/summoner name has been changed. To learn the details that were changed we need to just prove that it was our accounts.{{champion:72}}

We can help, but it will have to be on one of the support tickets you submitted, since we'll have to do some investigating and ask some additional information from you. Response times are a bit longer than normal due to the end of the season, but if you sit tight, we'll get to you soon.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I cannot acces my account anymore i did a password changement right before i created this topic but its still doesnt let me acces because the client doesnt know what server my account is....

my account has more then 1100 euro on it so please fix this asap ....
We'll do our best to help you out, but we're going to need your patience until we can get to your ticket(s).

BUMP

2 days now almost 3 that i have no answer on my 5 tickets i send about this problem ,,,

I really dont want to lose my account cause i paied a transfer m thats completely stupid :S

> [{quoted}](name=Magic Trick,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Jso1OJV1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-14T17:51:10.416+0000)
>
> BUMP
> 
> 2 days now almost 3 that i have no answer on my 5 tickets i send about this problem ,,,
> 
> I really dont want to lose my account cause i paied a transfer m thats completely stupid :S

When you resubmit or bump a ticket it gets put to the back of the queue, There is currently a lot of transfers and support tickets as it is preseason so you could be putting yourself a day back each time, I got a reply almost a day later. I'm sure they will get to it promptly if you let the ticket get to the front.

> [{quoted}](name=ramarsterking,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Jso1OJV1,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T18:51:11.237+0000)
>
> Did they fix your account?

Not yet unfortuantly, I have only confirmed with a member of staff that the problem still persists.

Hey, I got the same issue, I payed the rp for the transfer on my main and the account can no longer be accessed on the NA server but I cannot log in on the EUW server where it was moved to, I'm hoping it's just due to high traffic of account transfers as there must be Â£1000+ worth of content on the account. I have submitted a ticket since about 12 hours ago but no reply yet to let me know if the account is still safe.

Previously Na Acc: VermilionWater

Edit: I also cannot log into the account on my browser, I have tried every server on both my browser and client.
